archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.2.7b: b) making use of services which are elastic and scalable, enabling on-demand expansion and reduction in resources for particular applications and services (e.g. cloud computing services).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
